testcaseName: Patient is 50 years and has been administered Dose #1  as Janssen and Dose #2 as Pfizer and Dose #3 as Moderna

administeredDoses.vaccineName: Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine (EUA labeled)  COMIRNATY (BLA labeled)

doses.vaccineName: Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine (EUA labeled)  COMIRNATY (BLA labeled)

generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient that is 50 years or older and has been administered a Janssen Covid-19 as a first dose and a Pfizer Covid-19 vaccine as a second (first booster) and Moderna and a third (second booster) dose that another dose (bivalent) should be forecast.
reasonForChange: v4.27 Updated test case to align with the current Interim Clinical Considerations (09/2/2022) for a new bivalent mRNA booster after completion of a monovalent primary series; it replaces all prior booster recommendations for this age group.
